ETYMOLOGY: Compound of 'head' (referring to being worn on the head) and 'set' (referring to a complete apparatus or device).

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Noun: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A device consisting of a pair of headphones, typically with a microphone attached, worn on the head, used for listening to audio and often for speaking.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一种戴在头上、由一副耳机（通常带麦克风）组成的设备，用于听音频，常用于通话。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: He put on his gaming headset to communicate with his teammates during the online match.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他戴上游戏耳机，以便在网络比赛中与队友交流。
